name: Spirito
description:
This is a work in progress fully functional Windows PC test game with no ads. Eventually this game will be on iOS and Google Play, but this is what we have now. Because the ads do not work, the reward videos will not trigger, but the game plays great. 

Controls: All you need is a mouse to move the game character.

Game Play: The spirits are merging and flowing. Tag and gather each passing ghost.

Each time you pass through the Spirito black hole your mass increases X3 until you become a huge collection of souls.

  • Tag a red spirit and they will destroy all your enemies on screen.
  • Little white spirits attract much needed burning stars.
  • Burning stars make you indestructible.
  • You must first get a burning star before you touch a gold coin, or the gold coins will take you out. Hint: If your head is on fire, you are safe to collect gold coins.
  • Avoid the bat winged satellites that shoot laser beams. Terrible things.
  • Stay out of the way of the pink whirly-gigs that fly around. Stupid kids.
  • Watch out for crows and the occasional sea monster.
  • Trade gold coins you have gathered for Spirito upgrades and unlock new Spiritos to play. 

More game info at: JEMoores.com
